PHYSICAL SECURITY

PROTECTING FACILITY ASSETS FROM UNAUTHORIZED AND THREATENING ACTIVITIES.

Our specialized consultants evaluate and detect security threats and risks against individuals and properties. A customized security solution is designed and installed according to each client’s needs, providing functional layers of integrated defense systems including fencing, intrusion detection, access control, screening and inspection.

SOLUTIONS

Explosives
& Narcotics Detection

Trace detection and identification our solutions are ideal for military applications, airports, ports, police stations, border checkpoints, government buildings, prisons and other places to secure.

Liquid Explosives Detectors

Advanced tools for detecting explosive substances in liquid form. These liquid explosives detectors deliver an accurate and rapid result to the screening inspection stations.

GAMMA
& CTX Scanners

The unit’s design provides high-resolution 3D images for quick and accurate threat detection in space or weight restricted environments to identify threats.

Perimeter Security

Provides both an early warning of attempted intrusion as well as deterring and/or delaying entry of intruders.

Optical Surveillance/Search

A system for of monitoring and surveillance of areas of interest with protection against penetration of intruders during day or/and nighttime.

Conventional Machine
(X-Ray)

Provides the highest resolution and detail of any of the currently available imaging tools.

Cargo Scanning
(X-ray high energy)

Systems with a linear accelerator sources penetrate the densest cargo and produce quality images for successful detection.

Surveillance
& Monitoring (CCTV)

Provide additional security through the use of video cameras for surveillance in areas that require ongoing monitoring.
